title: Fps drops from 150 on high settings to 20-30 and most of the times dc's me
body: This is super frustrating because i bought this pc for league specifically and everything was great until the update and now nothing is working. I have done what multiple threads say from resetting graphics cards to a complete pc reboot and the LoL repair tool does nothing. Please get back to me asap.

replies.body: If you're getting disconnected, you might actually be experiencing packet loss which can show symptoms like frame drops.  It sounds like your network might be having an issue that's cutting you off from the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for your specific issue to get us an overview of what's happening.  Let me know what you find!
